thread.title: Luis Feliz

author: Luis Feliz
title: Luis Feliz
text: I contacted eDreams Customer Service to change my arrival-departure dates of my trip in Business. In this process, inadvertently, it was changed to Economy, while still charging me for a full Business Ticket. When I contacted again eDreams Customer Service, they were really helpful in finding a solution for me and apologized for the incident. In the end, I was able to get the change of my Business tickets, and eDreams even offered to pay half of the cost of the difference I had to pay for the flight change. This was a very unexpected and pleasant surprise. I want to thank Ibrahim at the Customer Service for his politeness, education and disposition to help. It was good to feel that a company was on your side!
